title: Wonder, Love, and Praise
subtitle: A Supplement to The Hymnal 1982
copyright: Copyright © 1997 by The Church Pension Fund

hymns.title: Signs of endings all around us
The desert shall rejoice
Isaiah the prophet has written of old
People, look East. The time is near
Mingxing canlan tiandi ning (Stars shine brightly, earth is still)
Where is this stupendous stranger?
As panting deer desire the waterbrooks
Mantos y palmas esparciendo va (Filled with excitement, all the happy throng)
As in that upper room you left your seat
As in that upper room you left your seat
Three holy days enfold us now
Three holy days enfold us now
Three holy days enfold us now
You laid aside your rightful reputation
O sacred head, sore wounded
When Jesus came to Golgotha they hanged him on a tree
Faithful cross, above all other (Crux fidelis inter omnes)
Sing of the sun from darkness appearing
Mira allá en el Calvario (Look on Calvary's summit)
See that host all dressed in white
Filled with the Spirit's power, with one accord
Loving Spirit, loving Spirit
O threefold God of tender unity
O Trinity of blessed light
God, beyond all human praises
God the sculptor of the mountains
God the sculptor of the mountains
From the dawning of creation
The tree of life my soul hath seen
So the day dawn for me
Up on the mountain my Lord spoke
There's a sweet, sweet Spirit in this place
hymns.tune: [There's a sweet, sweet Spirit in this place]

hymns.title: When from bondage we are summoned
When from bondage we are summoned
The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases
I am weak and I need thy strength and power
Will you come and follow me if I but call your name?
Tú has venido a la orilla (You have come down to the lakeshore)
With awe approach the mysteries
O wheat, whose crushing was for bread
All who hunger gather gladly
Whoever comes to me shall never hunger
As we gather at your table
I will bless the Lord at all times
O blessed spring, where Word and sign
You're called by name, forever loved
Baptized in water
I believe in God almighty
I believe in God almighty
O God of gentle strength
O God of gentle strength
O Christ, the healer we have come
Heal me, hands of Jesus
From miles around the sick ones came
Give thanks for life, the measure of our days
No saint on earth lives life to self alone
Sing alleluia forth in duteous praise
We all are one in mission
The church of Christ in every age
Lord, you give the great commission
Now let us rise and hymn the grace
Gracious Spirit, give your servants
Heleluyan, heleluyan (Alleluia, Alleluia)
Christ the Lord to us said
Santo, santo, santo (Holy, holy, holy)
Cantad al Señor un cántico nuevo
We are marching in the light of God (Siyahamb' ekukhanyen' kwenkhos') (Marcharemos en la luz de Dios)
As newborn stars were stirred to song
Peace among earth's peoples is like a star
Put peace into each other's hands
Peace before us, peace behind us
Holy God, you raise up prophets
Here, O Lord, your servants gather (Sekai no tomo to te o tsunagi)
Muchos resplandores Muchos resplandores, sólo una luz (Many are the light-beams from the one light)
Come now, O Prince of Peace
Unidos, unidos, en tu nombre (Together, together, in your name)
Not my brother, not my sister, but it's me, O Lord
hymns.tune: [Not my brother, not my sister,but it's me, O Lord]

hymns.title: Lord Jesus, think on me
Abide with me: fast falls the eventide
Precious Lord, take my hand
God be with you till we meet again
Cuando el pobre nada tiene (When the poor one who has nothing)
These three are the treasures
My Lord he calls me by the thunder
I want Jesus to walk with me
If you believe and I believe
Put down your nets and follow me
Thuma mina (Send me, Lord)
We adore you. Lord, we love you
You who dwell in the shelter of the Lord
You shall cross the barren desert
I, the Lord of sea and sky
Way, way, way
Jesus Christ, Son of God
Jesus said: The first commandment is this
Christ is risen from the dead
Christ is risen from the dead
Sh'ma Yisrael (Hear, O Israel)
Guide my feet Lord
The eyes of all wait upon you
Glory to God
Through north and south and east and west
Benedictus benedicat, per Jesum Christum
God grant them many years!
Bless the Lord my soul
Stay with me (Noho pū)
O Lord hear my pray'r
Beati in domo Domini
Laudate Dominum
Laudate omnes gentes (E nā lāhuikanaka)
Ubi caritas (Aia nō e loa'a)
Come, Holy Spirit, from heaven
Our Father in heaven
Pater Noster (Our Father)
Lord, have mercy
Lord, have mercy
Kyrie eleison
Lord, have mercy
Lord, have mercy
Kyrie eleison
Kyrie eleison
Lord, have mercy
Holy God
Holy God
Holy God
Holy God
Alleluia, Alleluia
Alleluia, Alleluia
We believe in one God
Holy, holy, holy Lord
Holy, holy, holy Lord
Holy, holy, holy Lord
Holy, holy, holy Lord
Holy, holy, holy Lord
Holy, holy, holy Lord
Holy, holy, holy Lord
Holy, holy, holy Lord
Holy, holy, holy Lord
Holy, holy, holy Lord
Christ has died
Christ has died
Amen
Amen
Our Father in Heaven
Alleluia. Christ our Passover is sacrificed for us
Alleluia. Alleluia. Alleluia. Christ our Passover
The bread which we break is a sharing
Lamb of God, you take away the sins of the world
Cordero de Dios (Agnus Dei)
Cordero de Dios
Lamb of God, you take away the sins of the world
Agnus Dei qui tollis peccata mundi
Alleluia. Alleluia. Those who eat my flesh
Whoever eats this bread
Be known to us, Lord Jesus
The disciples knew the Lord Jesus
The disciples knew the Lord Jesus
Whoever comes to me shall not hunger
Christ our Passover
God's Paschal Lamb is sacrificed for us
Surely, it is God who saves me
Surely, it is God who saves me
hymns.tune: [Surely, it is God who saves me] (Tone 7)

hymns.title: Arise, shine, for your light has come
O all ye works of God
Let all creation bless the Lord
Glory to you, Lord God of our fathers
Glory to you, Lord God of our fathers
Almighty Lord Most High draw near
Blessed be the God of Israel
Blessed are you O Lord our God
hymns.tune: [Blessed are you O Lord our God] (Tone 5)

hymns.title: With my own eyes I have seen the salvation
Splendor and honor, majesty and power
Splendor and honor and kingly power
Splendor and honor and royal pow'r
O ruler of the universe, Lord God
Glory to God in the highest
Glory to God in the highest
Glory to God in the highest
Glory, Glory, hallelujah, Lord we praise your Holy name
Glory to God in the highest
Glory to God in the highest
You are God: we praise you
hymns.tune: [You are God: we praise you] (Plainsong, Tone 8)

hymns.title: You are God: we praise you
Wisdom freed from a nation of oppressors
Wisdom freed a holy people
Even when young, I prayed for wisdom's grace
